name: TradeGlobal
overview:
TradeGlobal, a division of Netrada, is the first software application to enable a streamlined end-to-end cross-border logistics solution. TradeGlobal provides unique flexibility and ease of use in the global consumer marketplace, a clear differentiator in the internet retail space. TradeGlobal features flexible integration, global content management, full landed costs calculations, global payment and fraud management solutions.

â€¢ Global Reach without the Risk: Reach global consumers around the world without the risks associated with international transactions, including complex international logistics and costly capital investments.

â€¢ Fulfillment Independent: TradeGlobal allows you to keep your existing fulfillment provider and location. We provide all the back-end systems to generate the forms and shipping labels at your own location. There is no third party consolidation of goods before shipping. We also offer a competitively priced fulfillment center for customers who wish to allow us to handle their fulfillment needs.

â€¢ Country Independent: TradeGlobal allows you to ship your product from any country, to any country. There is no shipping consolidation or restrictions.

â€¢ Easily and Quickly Integrated: TradeGlobal is easily integrated into your existing site and existing fulfillment operations. You can begin shipping products internationally almost immediately. The Software as a Service package is pre-integrated with several leading web platforms.

â€¢ Guaranteed Landed Costs: TradeGlobal provides the fully landed costs in the buyerâ€™s preferred currency, inclusive of all duties, taxes, and shipping costs â€“ with no surprises or C.O.D. charges.

â€¢ Multi-currency Global Shopping: TradeGlobal shows all final pricing in the customerâ€™s currency of choice, and includes all tariffs, taxes and fees to give a complete price.

â€¢ Global Logistics Management: TradeGlobal provides all international customs clearance paperwork, product classification, denied party screening, parcel fulfillment, and returns forms.

â€¢ Cost-effective Shipping Solutions: TradeGlobal provides the most cost-effective international shipping rates and will allow you to work with the carrier or carriers of your choice. All shipments are fully-trackable and delivered to your customersâ€™ doorsteps in days, not weeks.

â€¢ Fraud & Risk Management: TradeGlobal can provide international fraud screening for fraudulent activity to support your international payment processing.

â€¢ Global Customer Support: TradeGlobal can provide global customers with the same high quality customer service experience as a domestic transaction. Customer service representatives have full access to order information and tracking status to provide top of the line customer support for returns, exchanges, questions and service.

â€¢ Provides the Reach Without the Risk: Open your eCommerce site to the global marketplace with TradeGlobal. We provide the reach without the risk!
